release.description: This release of the Harvest-PDAP Tool is a component of the integrated release 6.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Improved registration performance by adding capability to perform batch registration on objects.
Reformat extracted date/time values to ISO 8601 format.
Set slot value to blank for 1970 stop date/time values.
Added capability to the policy configuration file to be able to specify a date/time range of the datasets to retrieve.
Updated to delete the package if no products are registered during a run.

release.action: Added the capability to register data sets from the PSA Registry.
Added support for handling of multiple values given in the TARGET_NAME, INSTRUMENT_NAME, and INSTRUMENT_ID fields in the PSA Registry.
Added support for registering associated resource products for every product registration.
Fixed to replace illegal URN characters with '-' characters in the data set ID when forming the logical identifier.
